item.title: v1.0.0
item.description: First release : - Link a Google Spreadsheet - Update an existing text with a random ipsum - Create a text box with a random ipsum

item.title: v1.1.0
item.description: Google has stopped supporting V3 API since august 2021. So, the plugin cannot work without the link between Sketch and Google Spreadsheet. Here is the list of changes: - API workflow has been edited (kudos to @benborgers for his opensheet project, that allows to get the Google spreadsheet data without authentication) - The spreadsheet tab name is required to make the plugin operate
